summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4884 for the improvement of East Marginal Way, from 1st Avenue South to the south city limits; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56034, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
